Text.Page:
It's not just two-legged foes we must fear. The barsicores are ferocious. They can eat a whole family in a single meal!

Since we're running out of families, I want you to kill some {@LinkCreature:34#1110#frosthunter bariscores}. Let their deaths be a lesson to other predators.

Did you know barsicore meat tastes wretched? It's like rotten mutton, only worse.

Well, I only needed you to kill them. We'll let the creatures of the waste eat what they can.

You can do it! I believe in you.

Barsicores aren't that big. Smaller than a dozen baraka, easily.
